title: Sign up
helperText: An email with a link to log in will be sent to you. You can create or change a password for your account once you've signed in.
helperTextSent: Email sent. Please check your inbox. In the case you don't receive the email, please check your spam folder or request a new one in %d seconds.

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.max: Password must be less than 128 characters long
